name: Darkness Shooter
description:
The monster hunter again took up arms, as monsters again emerge from the cursed portal, attacking people and taking them to their terrible world. The hope of the whole world is on you, save the world from the undead and shoot them all.

Darkness Shooter - One-action shooter, where the player controls the sight and shoots at enemies, from time to time shooting bonuses that replenish the hero's health and make it possible to continue his task.

Game features:
- Complexity
- Reaction Training
- Beautiful Pixel-Art
